Plot pcaviz object.

Description of this function goes here.

# S3 method for pcaviz
plot(x, coords, color, shape, color.and.shape, group,
     label = NULL, draw.points = is.null(label), colors, shapes,
     group.summary.fun = pcaviz_summary_default, group.summary.labels = TRUE,
     draw.linear.fit, draw.confint, confint.level = 0.95,
     show.r.squared, draw.pc.axes, hide.xy.axes, preserve.scale,
     plot.title, hide.legend = FALSE, theme = theme_pcaviz(),
     geom.point.params = list(size = 2,stroke = 1,na.rm = TRUE),
     geom.text.params = list(size = 3,fontface = "bold",na.rm = TRUE),
     geom.point.summary.params = list(shape = 19,stroke = 1,
       size = 10,show.legend = FALSE),
     geom.text.summary.params =
       list(size = 3.25,fontface = "plain",color = "black"),
     geom.abline.params.linearfit =
       list(color = "dimgray",linetype = "dashed"),
     geom.abline.params.confint =
       list(color = "dimgray",linetype = "dotted"),
     geom.abline.pc.axes =
       list(color = "black",linetype = "solid",size = 0.25),
     overlay = NULL, ...)
